title: Buff Groovy Zilean
body: Look Riot, I know you hate humanity. I'm aware you were losing money because Groovy Zilean was crowding out all the other skins, but you didn't need to gut it this hard. The new splash is AWFUL. It's the reason I stopped using the skin. Could you revert it or even make a new good splash art rather than keep it in the disgraceful state the skin is in right now.
